DESCRIPTION:
Jack Keane is back! And his new adventure dizzying than ever! A few years after his adventures with the Doctor T, the hapless hero Jack Keane returned to survive along with the beautiful Amanda greatest adventure of his life. But as usual, Jack soon realizes that things are not going as smoothly as he had imagined.
Shanghai, 1899. Mysterious Chinese city has become a magnet for adventurers of various kinds. So Jack brought here rumors about a legendary treasure, or to be more precise, these stories have led him right outside the walls of the infamous prison of Shanghai. It was said that it was confined to her shaman, the guardian of untold wealth. Unfortunately for our hero, Jack has completely ignored the fact that going to jail is much easier than getting out of it.
And this is just a new tie mad adventure Jack Keane! Mysterious Treasures, ruthless villains, two dazzling beauty and tons of humor await the most charming adventurer in an unprecedented comic journey. Jack not only meet old friends, but also to get acquainted with the new, such as the elegant and ingenious citizen Yves German engineer Karl.
